defs: to become bad, inferior or vile.
gold or any other metal, used for minting coin, that is inferior or impure.
a profession that is morally base, evil or sinful or socially offensive.
a person employed to perform minor household or personal duties.
a man who is morally base, evil or sinful.
to cause to cry aloud or scream (as from pain).
to voice a sudden, sharp loud cry (as from fear or pain); to scream.
to put the bit of a bridle into the mouth of a horse.
a small building separate from the main building, used as servaṇṭs quarter.
a space enclosed adjoining the main building; a house-yard.
a sagging face, as from weariness, shame, etc.
to cause to pluck or pull off or out.
to cause to dig (the earth).
to (fig.) overwhelm with noise (as if to deafen).
to pull off or out; to pluck; to root.
to extract or draw out money, valuables, property, etc. usu. using force.

ಕಿತ್ತುಕೊಳ್ಳು kittukoḷḷu to seize by a sudden or hasty grasp; to snatch; 2. to take something away from forcibly; to deprive; ಕಿತ್ತು ತಿನ್ನು kittu tinnu to trouble a person too much (as a distressed condition, poverty, etc.); ಕಿತ್ತು ಹಾಕು kittu hāku to pull out (a plant, etc.); 2. to cancel or repeal by authority; to abrogate; 3. to remove from the post, job, etc.; to sack; to dismiss; ಕಿತ್ತೊಗೆ kittoge (fig.) to dismiss (a person) from a job; to discharge; 2. (derog.) to transfer (an employee) to another place, (as a punishment or from hatred).
the lower position, status, rank; a wretched condition; a degraded situation.
a obsequious service.
a low-birth; an ignoble family.
gold that is inferior or impure.
the part of a bridle that goes into a horse's mouth, used to control the horse; a bit of a bridle.
a piece of land or region whose level is lower than the adjacent one or the one being compared with.
a watery discharge from the mucous membranes especially of the eyes; the rheum of the eye.
lower in space; placed lower down.
low or lower in order, status, rank, etc.; subordinate.
lower in quality, value or esteem than; paltry; mean.
nasty and disgusting; vile; loathsome; abominable.
a young of a cow; a calf.
an act or deed that morally base, sinful or vile or socially offensive.
any undesired, uncultivated plant, esp. one growing in profusion so as to crowd out a desired crop, disfigure a lawn, etc.; a useless or harmful weed.
a man who is morally base, evil or sinful; a wicked man.
a look or glance that shows disrespect, slight or that depreciates another; a disparaging look.
an eye-disease.
= ಕೀಳುಗೊಳಿಸು.
a canal situated below or at a lower level.
wind blowing from below.
wind blowing from where the animal to be hunted is towards the hunter.
a Śaiva mendicant of very low merit.
to lower in esteem; to speak slightingly of; to treat with disrespect; to disparage; to belittle.
people lacking virtues or merits.
a caste, in Indian social system, that was considered low or inferior.
the quality of being contemptible, mean or ignoble; meanness; baseness.
a low voice.
an inferior class category, kind or sort.
a sagging, down cast head.
the state of being defeated or dejected.
to lower one's head as in modesty, shyness or shame.
a deeply distressed, unhappy, miserable or unfortunate condition of being.
a gift, donation or favour endowed to an undeserved, disqualified person.
the periodic juice of rut of certain mammals, esp. an elephant, that is flowing downward.
1 = ಕೀಳುದಸೆ.
the downward direction or region that is below.
the land or region that is lying below.
to depend obsequiously on another.
words used to belittle, humiliate another; slighting speech.
to speak slightingly of; show disrespect for.

a minor or insignificant crop.
the result or consequence of an action, that is contemptible or undesirable.
to think or plan in a deceitful way.
a secret, harmful, underhanded plan or the way of thinking such a plan.

lowness in position, rank or status.
the quality or condition of being comparatively low in value and having relatively inferior properties.
the quality of a person lacking higher qualities of mind or spirit or lacking higher values; baseness; meanness.
to lower in esteem; to speak slightingly of; to treat with disrespect; to disparage; to belittle.
a combination superior and inferior things, qualities etc.
(myth.) the inferior region; the world supposed to be below our earth.
a village situated very close to and depending on a bigger one or a town; a satellite village.
the state or condition of being low in value, status or rank.
the plant Amaranthus paniculatus of Amaranthaceae family.
a servile, menial service.
a piece of (a plantain leaf).
(myth.) the region believed to be below the earth.

to humiliate; to belittle; to cause shame; to demean; to dishonour.

the portion of the belly below the navel in human.

words used to belittle, humiliate another; slighting speech.
